bactopia.description: Bactopia is a flexible pipeline for complete analysis of bacterial genomes. The goal of Bactopia is to process your data with a broad set of tools, so that you can get to the fun part of analyses quicker!

cecret.description: Cecret is a workflow developed by @erinyoung at the Utah Public Health Laborotory for SARS-COV-2 sequencing with the artic/Illumina hybrid library prep workflow for MiSeq data.

donut_falls.description: Donut Falls is a basic assembly workflow for Nanopore sequencing.

dryad.description: Dryad is a pipeline to construct reference free core-genome or SNP phylogenetic trees for examining prokaryote relatedness in outbreaks. Dryad will performs both a reference free core-genome and/or a SNP analysis using the CFSAN-SNP pipeline.

grandeur.description: Grandeur is short-read de novo assembly pipeline with serotyping.

mycosnp.description: MycoSNP is a portable workflow for performing whole genome sequencing analysis of fungal organisms, including Candida auris.

phoenix.description: PHoeNIx: A short-read pipeline for healthcare-associated and antimicrobial resistant pathogens.

spriggan.description: Spriggan is a pipeline used for assembly of bacterial whole genome sequence data and identification of antibiotic resistance genes.

viralrecon.description: Viralrecon is a pipeline used to perform assembly and intra-host/low-frequency variant calling for viral samples.
